title: Action Replay DS Installer, and Drivers!
description: Torrent includes the Software, and the driver for windows. INSTALL THE SOFTWARE BEFORE CONNECTING YOUR DS TO YOUR PC. The software should load the correct drivers for the DS. If you install the software, and nothing, try plugging your DS into the PC, and going to device manager. Look for "DS Link" or something. Point Device Manager to the directory you put everything in.
